content: Can you provide an Excel table listing 5 animals that are herbivores along with their scientific names and preferred vegetation types?

Sure! Here's an Excel-style table listing five herbivorous animals along with their scientific names and preferred vegetation types:

| Common Name   | Scientific Name        | Preferred Vegetation Types      |
|---------------|------------------------|---------------------------------|
| Elephant      | Loxodonta africana     | Grasses, fruits, bark, and roots|
| Giraffe       | Giraffa camelopardalis | Leaves, fruits, and flowers     |
| Panda         | Ailuropoda melanoleuca | Bamboo                          |
| Hippopotamus  | Hippopotamus amphibius | Grasses                         |
| Koala         | Phascolarctos cinereus | Eucalyptus leaves               |

If you have any more questions or need further information, feel free to ask!
